content: a cute wee tunic pattern really fast and really basic a great car trip or no brainer project great for gifts if you want to knit it in the round - here is a link to the changes made 1 i will most probably size this up in the next coming months as i need it 1 http //rebeccagunn blogspot com/2011/07/super-simple-baby-tunic-for-knit-in html
